thread.section_title: CurrencyFair Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CurrencyFair | currencyfair.com
thread.title: Ronnie

author: Ronnie
title: Ronnie
text: I was recommended CurrencyFair by a fellow Canadian currently living in Ireland, that also needs to send money home to their Canadian account on a regular basis to pay off student loans. She has been using the service for 1 year so I felt confident trying as well! I did my first transfer last month and it was super easy - my money was transferred in 2 days and it cost me 9x less than it did when I was transferring through my bank! I also loved that instead of organizing a bank transfer, you can simply charge it as a regular charge to your debit/Visa. I'll be using CurrencyFair from now on.
